statements: SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_properties FROM materials WHERE cost_per_unit > 50;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Steel%';
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM materials WHERE cost_per_unit > 100 ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT material_name, material_properties FROM materials WHERE material_properties LIKE '%water%'
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE cost_per_unit < 50 OR cost_per_unit > 200 ORDER BY cost_per_unit ASC
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit, material_properties FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM materials;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer_name, material_name FROM manufacturers INNER JOIN materials ON manufacturers.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, SUM(cost_per_unit) AS total_cost FROM manufacturers INNER JOIN materials ON manufacturers.material_id = materials.material_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT * FROM materials JOIN manufacturers ON materials.material_id = manufacturers.material_id WHERE materials.cost_per_unit > 50
SELECT materials.material_name, manufacturers.manufacturer_name FROM materials, manufacturers WHERE manufacturers.material_id = materials.material_id AND materials.cost_per_unit < 100

SELECT materials.material_name, manufacturers.manufacturer_name FROM materials INNER JOIN manufacturers ON materials.material_id = manufacturers.material_id WHERE materials.cost_per_unit BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY manufacturers.manufacturer_name DESC
SELECT materials.material_name, manufacturers.manufacturer_name FROM materials LEFT JOIN manufacturers ON materials.material_id = manufacturers.material_id WHERE materials.cost_per_unit < 50

SELECT materials.material_name AS material, materials.material_properties AS properties, manufacturers.manufacturer_name AS manufacturer FROM materials RIGHT JOIN manufacturers ON materials.material_id = manufacturers.material_id WHERE manufacturers.manufacturer_name = 'ABC Corp' AND materials.cost_per_unit > 100
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, cost_per_unit FROM materials WHERE cost_per_unit > 100;
SELECT material_name, material_properties FROM materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM materials WHERE cost_per_unit < 50 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT m.material_name, mp.property_name FROM materials m JOIN material_properties mp ON m.material_id = mp.property_id;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM materials WHERE cost_per_unit > 50 ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC
SELECT * FROM material_properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%strength%'
SELECT material_name, cost FROM materials INNER JOIN material_cost ON materials.material_id = material_cost.material_id WHERE material_name LIKE 'Steel'
SELECT material_name, material_properties FROM materials WHERE material_properties IS NOT NULL ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT property_name, property_description FROM material_properties ORDER BY property_name
SELECT * FROM printing_materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, cost_per_unit FROM printing_materials WHERE cost_per_unit > 100;
SELECT material_name, material_type, cost_per_unit FROM printing_materials WHERE material_type = 'Paper';
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type, cost_per_unit FROM printing_materials ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM printing_materials;
SELECT * FROM printing_materials WHERE cost_per_unit > 50 ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT material_name, material_type, cost_per_unit FROM printing_materials WHERE material_id = 3
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_properties FROM printing_materials WHERE material_type = 'Paper'
SELECT p.property_name, p.property_description, m.material_name FROM material_properties p INNER JOIN printing_materials m ON p.property_id = m.material_id

SELECT m.material_name, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM printing_materials m INNER JOIN material_inventory i ON m.material_id = i.material_id GROUP BY m.material_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM material_properties;
SELECT material_name, density FROM material_properties;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM cost_per_unit;
SELECT * FROM material_characteristics WHERE heat_resistance = true;
SELECT material_name, application FROM material_usage WHERE durability = true;
SELECT material_name, density, tensile_strength FROM material_properties;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM cost_per_unit WHERE cost_per_unit > 100;
SELECT material_name, heat_resistance FROM material_characteristics ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, application, durability FROM material_usage WHERE durability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM material_inventory WHERE supplier LIKE '%Company%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
